entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source generator warning duplication and missing link and description #69826
  • Source generator - fail to generate source with message 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces #69819

Closed

  • Regression in VS 17.7 Preview 1: false positive for CS8602 after call to Assert.IsNotNull (NUnit). No false positive in VS 17.6. #68885
    17.8
  • Can not resolve symbol method when using System.Diagnostics.Conditional #69773
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34105.100 #69818
  • Remove WellKnownMembers.System_ReadOnlySpan_T__op_Implicit_ReadOnlySpan_T_Array if not needed #69692
    17.8
  • (Linux only?) Method group intrinsic type ignores params and default arguments #69797

PullRequests

Created

  • Only switch focus when text identifier has focus in rename flyout #69825
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bump NuGet version #69824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests. (#69690)" #69823
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Update packages to prep for NuGet publish (#69497)" #69822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify the test to cover the scenario #69821
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Fix folding range bug in C# extension #69817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update LanguageServerHost to use NamedPipe #69816
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove well known implicit conversion method #69787
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Don't hit the file cache multiple times unnecessarily #69815
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make completion handler more resilient #69795
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.8
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Test #69814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Mark export attributes as Inherited = false #69810
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Slightly fewer allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #69791
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring of synthesized types tracking across EnC generations #69782
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during ToDisplayString #69800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parameters #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
